Все понравилось. Играл бы в нее и дальше, но хороших игр много, а времени мало.
Если будете играть, приготовьтесь страдать первые часов 30-40. Здесь нубо ранги играют на равных с более опытными ребятами и скорее всего вам будут попадаться сильные соперники, от чего может неплохо пригорать. В этом случае просто расслабьтесь, фармите очки и качайте своих персов, чтобы позже отомстить врагам)
Чай чай выручай...
The game is very nice to play.

Pútavá hra so skvelým nápadom, progressom a dobrou dávkou horroru - ešte lepšie než hrať solo je s partiou. 

Škoda je len, že devs nevedia dobre vybalansovať postavy killerov a preto každý patch je pár z nich moc silných a niektorí slabší.
To isté je s charakter perkami, niektoré sú úplne zbytočné, lebo ich nikto nepoužíva.

A inak... Hra sa dá rozbehnúť aj na slabšej grafike a hrať plnohodnotne.

不知道制作组是怎么想的，你tm改长短板，加疲劳，各种增强屠夫我都没意见，比较不对称竞技游戏没有平衡可言，但是你tm连大卫的落井下石你tm都削？原本加100/150/200%血点的，你tm给我改成50/75/100%？你吃多了撑着了是吧。我tm为了血点有空就肝，为队友抗三刀救人（钢筋铁骨+秒表）就是为了刷这个技能的层数，我不出去血点比他们出去了的还多。但是你tm动这个技能干什么？？？！！！真的是那个设计师吃到sh*t了然后干出那么恶心的事，外挂刷血点你不管，你tm砍我这个加血点的技能干嘛？？？？真的你怎么削人类我都没意见，改放板放饭，该吃刀吃刀。你tm居然干出这种事情，真的恶心这个改动！！！！

thumbs down for 2022

Mir macht dieses Game nach wie vor Spaß. Den einzigen Kritikpunkt den ich geben würde, sind die massigen Häken. Freiwiggeln ist so gut wie unmöglich mehr. Wenn da vllt noch ne Balance kommt in dem Bezug, wäre es top.

Edit, ich finde es klasse, dass immer noch so viel an dem Spiel gearbeitet wird. keine Selbstverständlichkeit heut zu Tage mehr.

Ich habe dieses Spiel früher sehr gerne gespielt da aber viele von meinen Freunden aufgehört haben und keine Lust mehr auf das Spiel hatten habe ich mich auch dazu entschlossen ein neues Spiel mit ihnen anzufangen. Nach und nach bekam ich wieder Lust auf das Spiel aber nur auf "Killer" ,denn Survivor alleine mit 3 zufälligen Leuten zu spielen ist echt eine Zumutung. Lange Rede kurzer Sinn: Ich habe das Spiel wieder installiert, gestartet und erstmal angeschaut was in den letzten beiden Jahren dazugekommen ist und es ist sehr viel! Nicht nur das Spiel ansich wurde positiv verändert sondern auch viel guter Content zum Beispiel die neuen Killer, Survivor, Perks und Maps sind nicht schlecht. Die Performance wurde auch stark verbessert, denn früher hatte ich immer kleine Ruckler bei den Skill-Checks, das auch viele von meinen Freunden dazu gebracht hat aufzuhören einschließlich mich. Das neue Shop System und die neuen Währungen finde ich auch sehr gut und auch dass man mit echten Geld bezahlen kann gut. Jedoch was ich sehr ärgert ist dass ich meist 30 Minuten warten muss bis ein Survivor meiner Lobby beitritt und an meinem Internet liegt das nicht. Naja im Großen und Ganzen ein gutes Spiel jedoch verliere ich sofort wieder die Lust wenn ich 30 Minuten warten muss dass ich eine Runde Killer spielen kann deshalb würde ich in dme Fall das Spiel nicht weiter empfehlen.

What can I say about this game. Well, first off it is stupidly fun. If you like pretty much consistent character progression (via unlocking skills, skins, etc.) then you'll enjoy this game. I've played quite a bit and have unlocked all the teachable perks for the all the Survivors. Started working on Killers but the queue for them is a bit long. Managed to hit Rank 6 as a Survivor.

I do have to give this game the thumbs down, unfortunately, because of the players themselves. The game is pretty well done and fun to play. The thing that absolutely kills any fun in this game is the players DC'ing when they get caught, when they feel they have been "wronged" or whatever other reason they get upset over.

As of right now, NOTHING is being done about the rampant DC'ing in the game. While the game is fun, until they do something about the DC'ing (just like every other game out there with a competitive ranking), this game will go downhill due to the players.

It would be in the developers best interest to start doing something about this NOW rather than wait until their game goes the way of Evole.

This game is a GARBAGE FIRE! 
Its just fucking horrable. 
The game machanics work 50% of the time, most of the killers are camping little shits, the fanbace is more toxic then sammy classic sonic fan on a good day, half the perks are usless, Half the killers are pay to win, most of the maps are the same thing with little diffrences. the matchmaking of this game is fucking horrable ( So bad it makes CSGOs one look good.), the ranking system is just awful and should be touched up, finding a game takes a long time sometimes and playing as the killer expands that waiting time by 10, none of the characters are intresting and the only intressting one in bill and he is just bad. (Thats why you always see noobs pick him. he is the most intersting. ) , the leveling up system is probably the only reason i come back every time to play this game and its a blast to play with friends but besides that its probably one of the worst horror games i have on my steam library.

if you want to play a free and good version of this game, search for something called "Escape the facility". ye i know i will get hate for what it is on but it is way more fun and the macanics fix things like cheating and camping and everyone is the same level from the get go. 

Dont buy this game thinking that you will be paired with people your level. it will take long and you will be stomped on. if you have friends who play it then play with them. trust me.

I really think DBD is a real fun and amazing concept for a game, I've been playing it pretty much since release however I didn't grind it like I did other games I came back now and again when new Killers were released, just to keep up to date. 

I do agree with some points Survivors have been op in the past, but so have certain Killers as well all this talk about op / nerf happens in literally ever competitive multiplayer game. 

In my opinion the bugs are minor, but they do happen from time to time but i've never experinced anything proper game breaking, (Apart from one time I fell through the map > but it only happened once so it's not a big deal in my eyes but I digress) 

Right now I still really enjoy the game however its not at matter of whether which side is more op, it's how you play them and honestly no offence to new / bad / young / players who keep dying get tunneled just not knowing how to play is really fustrating but it's all down to the experince at the end of the day, yes there will always be toxic Survivors / Killers there's no doubt about it but when you get a good team that all work together / Killer who doesn't camp or tunnel but still manages to kill everyone or a few it's still really enjoyable. 

Anyway in my opinion if you're interested in the game check it out, it's not a very expensive game and if you really dislike it for whatever reason don't hate on the devs for how the game is played and if something is op or not the game has constant updates and changes for a reason, it's mainly the toxic community that gives the bad experience. 

If anyone has actually took their time to read this I appreciate it and I hope you found it helpful in some way ^^ !

This game is fun indeed...but it has its problems. Being asymmetrical, that is, 4v1 indeed the stats are for the killer -understandable, but when you have 2 or less players -it's as if it's unbalanced somewhat. It's hard to win as surv (if you have a real good killer).I'm not a good player i've reached only surv rank 12, but i've heard that a vast majority of the community is rank 10 or higher. and that being rank 10 or lower its hard to find matches or they can be frustrasting. I've never really seen toxicness like this before. This was the most toxic commmuity I have ever played in a gaming community.  But also met some new friends. I dont care about the DC's and the Perks, whose overpowered and what needs nerfing. A really good killer can wipe out all 4 survs fast and think the killer is cheating, not making it too fun for survs -happens on new seasons. But 4 really good survs on SWF can make a good killer hate this game. My guess is the balance is 2 really good survs vs 1 good killer, 4 noobs vs 1 noob. It's a guess i could be wrong -probably am. 
To all the new players, advice is this, read up on the game play, watch youtube vids, read posts and forums or whatever before playing. you are gonna want to catch up on some tactics before you play. noobs agaist noobs probably the most balanced. I love this game no doubt and since I had it for less than a year I've had updates about 10 times. Which means the devs are working on it good or bad but mainly means they are still investing time on it. This game promotes competiveness so if you're not a competitive gamer I dont know if you would like it. But there are some golden matches that you will play that will make you love this game. Unfortuanatly it's about a 1 in 4-6 chance. Generally/pubicly I want to recommend this game but I cannot, if I do recommend get it on sale just in case you don't like it. If you do like it well then you saved some dough.

10 outta 10.1

pretty good. As a killer and survivor main, it's pretty balanced. 

If you are getting into the game as a solo survivor, I HEAVILY recommend using the perk "kindred". It lets you know where your teammates are while someone is hooked, and shows teammates where each other are if you are hooked. This perk cancels so many of those moments where you die on first hook because no one got you off of it. Your other survivors know who is going for saves thanks to it.

As a beginning killer, I recommend sloppy butcher. It makes survivors bleed more and have to heal for longer when they get hit. The long heals can help games not go by as fast if the survivors are paranoid of you and want to heal. Plus, the increased bleeding helps newer players whose ears are not use to finding survivors via grunting, to find them and to stick to the chase easier, due to the blood sometimes being easier to see at times compared to scratch marks.

Anyone can be good at this game with enough practice. You will hate/love this game

Dead by Daylight - 4 выживших и 1 маньяк. 
Задача выживших: Починить 5 генераторов и открыть ворота.
Задача Убийцы: Убить всех выживших и насадить на крюк, тем самым принести в жертву.
I love this game

No fun factor for survivor side, all i go against is deathslinger, spirit, nurse and pyramid head. Just boring games, no outplay potential or any chase interaction. I can't describe how frustrating this trash game is. I could disconnect against these killers but then i would have to disconnect 80% of the time.


My urge to uninstall is getting stronger and stronger.

Update #1: The most recent patch made dbd completely unplayable. From now on i have [b] ZERO [/b]  reason to play dbd, the movement is completely broken and f'd. At the moment there is no possible way to have fun as survivor in dbd. New survivor animations removed the skill cap from survivor movement. Seems like they f'd the hitboxes too. Don't even bother to use pallets or windows the killer will hit you anyways, actually don't even bother to play the game. The UI is trash but the least of my problems. The devs actually just want veteran players like me out of the game. They don't want us.

If i could i would punch the whole dev team.

Let your voice be heard and spam #RevertDBDMovement everywhere.

Update #2: They fixed the movement, still need to get used to the new animations, but its bearable. New UI is better, could be improved tho. Hitboxes are better i guess. Overall dbd is working a lot better than it used to before the latest bug fix. I still can't recommend this game to anyone. I can't predict how the next update breaks the game, maybe killers get infinite duration one hit or perhaps survivors can tank 3 hits by default. These devs are completely unpredictable, and they could break the game at any time at any second.

Update #3: 2021 dbd in summer was actually great. Dbd was in a good place, player count kept growing bigger, dbd even made player count records. I played shit load in summer and was satisfied overall. I kinda overdosed on dbd during summer, so i stopped playing after august. Bhvr released mmr which made the game pretty unfun, player count keeps dropping as we speak. Bhvr also released new killers, which obviously were antiloop killers which makes me wanna play less, so i just continued my break. I started playing again in late november - early december, been slowly recovering from summer and getting my motivation back to dbd. I am playing dbd currently, its pretty dogshit tbh. MMR was probably the biggest mistake bhvr made, it just doesn't work. I am ash IV and i have like 100-200 hours on killer, and every single game i get a team with 10-15k hours combined. Bhvr should just remove MMR, it would be the easiest and most effortless fix. Survivor gladly isn't as bad as killer, survivor is somewhat playable. As much as i love circle of healing, the perk is still after the nerf too strong and ruins the hit economy, coming from a survivor main btw. We also got the dev Q&A a while back, and it just shows that our lead game designer is actually delusional and pretty uncapable of doing his job. Thats it for the negativity, there is something positive too. The new killer sadako looks actually pretty nice and it also looks like fun to play against, so that is a nice change. Bhvr literally didn't release a single fun killer to play against during 2021. Thats pretty much it. I still can't recommend this game to anyone.
I dont remember buying this so it is a good game.
Really fun game. Indoor maps are terrible and suck to play, but everything else is great and very entertaining.

制作组从黎明杀机刚有起色的时候其实就有过抉择，是做成一款竞技游戏or恐怖游戏，最后的结果大家都知道，是后者，那么就不难理解制作组一直以来的改动，既然有了大方向，那么肯定就会向那个方向发展，只是在于路途的曲折与否，每一次更新改动都不可能是一帆风顺的，那么我希望大家对这款游戏是一个包容的态度，至少，制作组是朝着动态平衡在努力，而不是没有动作。在此我想对那些一昧的谩骂制作组的玩家说，如果你不能适应现在的版本，大可以过几个版本再玩亦或是选择另一款游戏。黎明杀机的开发商是我目前来说见到过的对待中国玩家最友好的开发商，非常希望热爱这款游戏的大家能多一些理解多一些包容，有好的想法亦或是建议完全可以向制作组提出，而不是一昧的谩骂和指责。这对游戏的改善不会有丝毫的帮助，反而会让新人望而却步，热爱黎明杀机的你希望是这样的结果吗？ 游戏的不断完善是需要每一位参与其中的人共同去努力的，无论是玩家亦或是作者。只是不知道大家还记不记得自己第一次遭遇杀手的时候那种惊心动魄让人难以入眠的体验呢？愿我们不忘初心。

Эээх.Бедный Dead By Daylight. В одни патчи-расцветает. В другие-гниёт.
    Итак. Игра Dead By Daylight будет интересная "особым" людям.P.S:Это не унижение.
    Я вам скажу сразу, у Dead By Daylight высокий порог вхождения. И новичкам будет сложно. Почему? Очень просто.В игре время-от времени сбрасываются ранги.Тоесть,
вы 20-ранга можете соревноваться с маньяком 20-ранга, но у него 200 часов.
Появляется вопрос:"А за кого играть?",-и я скажу:"В начале за одного из выживших, а потом за маньяков".Почему я не советую играть за выживших? Потому-что разработчики
"Убили" их. И это самое печальное, что есть в этой игре.Разработчики "Прогнулись" под 
маньяками "Нытиками".Они начали постоянно ныть:"Игра умирает, выжившие имба, мы слабаки, не справедливо!".-хоть это полный бред! Маньяки всегда были сильными, и 
нормальные убийцы никогда не ныли! Дальше. Если вы любитель хорошей картинки на вашем мониторе, то огорчу.Графика низкого качества. Но разработчики скоро это поправят.
                                                               Итог:
Dead By Daylight-Перспективный проект, но возможно он скоро сгниёт. Разработчики это пытаются исправить.И у них это наверно получается. "Стоит-ли покупать?",-Скажешь ты. "Попробуй, но готовся делать возврат средств",-отвечу я.Удачи.И играйте только в хорошие игры!
